main_definition: A person who is part of a group, organization, or structure.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Participant in an event or activity
meanings_and_examples.example: She was excited to be a member of the annual book club meeting.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An individual belonging to a group, organization, or team
meanings_and_examples.example: John is a proud member of his local soccer league.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person included in a set or series; one of the things making up such a whole
meanings_and_examples.example: The key features of this product include its fast response and easy-to-use interface, which are major members of our customer satisfaction criteria.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A component part or member of an instrumental mechanism or system
meanings_and_examples.example: Each string on a guitar is attached to one end of a tuning peg and the other end serves as a member in sound production.
